description:
Even after Big Mom was pushed off of the island, Zoro and the others keep fighting the exhausting battle against Kaido. When Kaido tries to beat up the unconscious Luffy, Zoro launches an all-out attack at the risk of his life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Defend Luffy! Zoro and Law`s Sword Technique!
Luffy o Mamore! Zoro to Law no Kengi
Protège Luffy. L’escrime de Zoro et Law !
Verteidigt Ruffy! – Zorro und Laws Schwerttechniken
Защитить Луффи! Техника владения мечом Зоро и Ло!
ルフィを守れ! ゾロとローの剣技
